description: Check the Opensea floor price of the NFTs you own, and calculate the total estimate of your NFT portfolio in $eth and $usd. You can use as an input file : either your ethereum address or a detailled description of the NFTs you own. (+ If you pass "web3" as an arg (web2 is the default arg), the dapp will output the $usd total value as a callback). Detailled documentation is on Github.
author: iExec
